title: Optimisation Services
tagline: Take ownership of your energy, metabolism, and nourishment.
description: Pick from three concierge programmes inspired by our previous clinic website—each one blends functional diagnostics with heartfelt support.
longDescription: Life optimisation is more than a single IV push. It is the careful threading together of hydration, nutrient density, metabolism, and nourishment so your mind and body feel synchronised. From our Marylebone lounge we offer three cornerstone services that collectively cover reset, reshape, and replenish.

seo.metaTitle: Life Optimisation Services London | IV Therapy, Weight Medicine, Nutrition
seo.metaDescription: Discover Dr. SNA Clinic's curated IV vitamin therapy, medicated weight management, and medical nutrition therapy programmes.

hero.headline: Focused Protocols, Powerful Shifts
hero.subheadline: Inspired by the most-loved programmes on our previous site—now refined for an even calmer, more luxurious journey.

introduction.title: Three Ways to Reclaim Your Vitality
introduction.content: Whether burnout has blurred your focus, hormones are sabotaging your weight, or inflammation has muted your appetite for life, our signature services provide a direct path back to balance. Each option can be experienced on its own or layered together for a comprehensive upgrade.

iv-vitamin-therapy.title: IV Vitamin Therapy
iv-vitamin-therapy.shortDescription: Medical-grade nutrient infusions based on your lab work.
iv-vitamin-therapy.description: Hydrate, remineralise, and calm inflammation with bespoke drips that mirror the IV formulas from our previous Marylebone clinic.

medicated-weight-management.title: Medicated Weight Management
medicated-weight-management.shortDescription: Doctor-prescribed medication paired with mindful coaching.
medicated-weight-management.description: Weekly accountability, appetite reset, and metabolic testing help you lose weight in a clinically safe, emotionally supportive environment.

medical-nutrition-therapy.title: Medical Nutrition Therapy
medical-nutrition-therapy.shortDescription: Functional nutrition plans to soothe inflammation and stabilise hormones.
medical-nutrition-therapy.description: Work with our clinical nutritionist to translate lab results into therapeutic meal plans, supplementation, and digestive care.

items.title: Calm private lounges
items.description: Infusions happen in cocoon-like suites with aromatherapy and warm blankets.

items.title: Continuity of care
items.description: See the same doctor and nutritionist throughout your journey.

items.title: Evidence-led supplements
items.description: All IV tracks and nutrition plans are formulated from peer-reviewed protocols.

steps.title: Comprehensive Assessment
steps.description: We revisit health questionnaires, biomarkers, and the goals you shared on our former site.

steps.title: Plan Activation
steps.description: IV bookings, medication delivery, or nutrition coaching begins within days.

steps.title: Rhythm & Review
steps.description: Data reviews every 4 weeks ensure you keep building momentum.

faq.question: Do I need blood tests before starting?
faq.answer: Yes, we review existing labs or arrange new panels to ensure every protocol is safe and targeted.

faq.question: Can I combine services?
faq.answer: Most patients blend IV therapy with either weight support or nutrition therapy for a comprehensive reset.

faq.question: Is financing available?
faq.answer: We offer staged payments for programmes over 8 weeks—speak with our patient concierge for details.

cta.title: Design Your Life Optimisation Plan
cta.subtitle: Share your goals and we will map the right combination of drips, medication, and nutrition.
